segments.text: Hello , I was wondering if I could talk with the apartment manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am the apartment manager . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was wondering if the apartment on Main Street is still available .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's still vacant . Are you interested in seeing it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I would love to see the apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be at the apartment today at 6
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I can be there at 6 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . I'll see you at 6 . Do you know where it is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have a friend who lives in that neighborhood .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be bringing an application form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , should I bring anything with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I might need to see your ID card , but that's about it .
segments.speaker: S2
